physical_examinations.vital_signs: Initially normal; During acute event: systolic blood pressure 60-70 mm Hg, heart rate 110-120 bpm, oxygen saturation 60-70%; After treatment: vital signs normalized
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Initial examination: normal vital signs and oxygen saturation; Acute event: cyanosis of lips and nails, bilateral scattered wheezing; After treatment: lung sounds slightly coarse, skin rashes on neck, waist, and limbs observed.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Vital signs normalized after treatment; Cyanosis disappeared; Lung sounds changed from bilateral scattered wheezing to slightly coarse.
